body_html: @pjh5 Thank you for you answer. I have solved this problem. Because I am installing caffe2 on a debian OS without sudo right, I cannot use apt install to install nccl. My solution is to install nccl on my own laptop and copied libnccl.2.x.x to this PC. Now it works well. Thank you again!
body_text: @pjh5 Thank you for you answer. I have solved this problem. Because I am installing caffe2 on a debian OS without sudo right, I cannot use apt install to install nccl. My solution is to install nccl on my own laptop and copied libnccl.2.x.x to this PC. Now it works well. Thank you again!
body: @pjh5 Thank you for you answer. I have solved this problem. Because I am installing caffe2 on a debian OS without sudo right, I cannot use `apt install` to install nccl. My solution is to install nccl on my own laptop and copied libnccl.2.x.x to this PC. Now it works well. Thank you again!
